system.description:
A wooden box containing a set of iron markers, reference texts, maps, and historical records which help a character predict the flow of a battle. By taking 10 minutes, a character can lay out the battle ahead to the best of their knowledge and make a Tactics check at a DC set by the GM. If they succeed, they can ask the GM three of the following questions about the upcoming battle and the GM must answer truthfully:
-What will the enemies' first move be?
-What is our best approach to this battle?
-Is there an element of the environment we can use to our benefit?
-How will our enemy react to our plan?
-Are there any aspects of the environment our enemy might use against us?
-Is the enemy likely to have set up traps?
